page.title: 18HISTORIC BUILDINGS
page.content: There is a hall in the village with a big farm attached. Mrs Hughes came to live there when she married and has lived there ever since. She has six children and many grand children. They frequently all come to stay for family occasions and she loves having them. The hall is an old seventeenth century building with beautiful gardens surrounding it which are sometimes open to the public. There is a big lake with wild fowl which is gaurded by wire all round to protect them from foxes. There is also a watwr garden which is planted on the site of the old swimming pool. There is a house on the site called the Nursey House which is where the children lived when they were small with their nanny. There is a large enclosure with a herd of red deer
